Rings.Name: Tiny Being's Ring
Location: Reward: Siegmeyer of Catarina in Anor Londo

Rings.Name: Cloranthy Ring
Effects: Stacks with Mask of the Child.

Rings.Name: Bloodbite Ring
Location: Purchase: Oswald of Carim for 10,000 souls

Rings.Name: Poisonbite Ring
Location: Purchase: Oswald of Carim for 15,000 souls

Rings.Name: Ring of Sacrifice
Location: Purchase: Oswald of Carim for 5,000 souls

Rings.Name: Rare Ring of Sacrifice
Effects: Death caused by curse will not take effect

Rings.Name: Bellowing Dragoncrest Ring
Location: Purchase: Griggs of Vinheim for 20,000 souls

Rings.Name: Lingering Dragoncrest Ring
Effects: Note: Does not increase miracles' effect length.
Location: Purchase: Griggs of Vinheim for 20,000 souls

Rings.Name: Darkmoon Seance Ring
Effects: Grants player entrance to Darkmoon Blades covenant at Anor Londo.

Rings.Name: Ring of the Sun's Firstborn
Effects: Stacks with Crown of Dusk/Dark Sun

Rings.Name: Darkmoon Blade Covenant Ring
Effects: Allows Gwyndolin to summon one player to invade another player's Dark Anor Londo.
Location: Covenant reward: Given upon joining the Darkmoon Blades covenant

Rings.Name: Ring of the Sun Princess
Location: Location: Obtained upon joining the Princess Guard covenant after speaking with Gwynevere in Anor Londo.

Rings.Name: Hawk Ring
Location: Location: Chest behind Giant Blacksmith in Anor Londo

Rings.Name: Hornet Ring
Location: Location: Darkroot Garden, on a corpse behind the gravestone in the boss area for Sif

Rings.Name: East Wood Grain Ring
Effects: Lessens the amount of durability loss.
Note: Does not lessen durability loss when using a weapon's special ability (i.e. dragon weapons' two-handed strong attack).
Location: Purchased from Shiva of the East (Blighttown).

Rings.Name: Dark Wood Grain Ring
Effects: Changes rolling action to a faster and wider one (ninja flip).
Only works when equip load is under 25% as of Patch 1.06
Location: Note: Need to be in Forest Hunter covenant for bodyguard to appear.

Rings.Name: Rusted Iron Ring
Effects: Removes the movement speed penalty in water, poison swamp, tar, etc.
Note: You need a special key to open a door before reaching the ring. See Undead Asylum for more information.

Rings.Name: Orange Charred Ring
Effects: Adds fire element to kick motion

Rings.Name: Old Witch's Ring
Effects: Note: Without the ring choosing to talk to her only prompts a "...?" response.
Location: Trade: Snuggly for a Sunlight Maggot

Rings.Name: Cat Covenant Ring
Effects: Allows Alvina to summon player to protect Darkroot Garden from other players
Note: Requires to be a member of the Forest Hunter Covenant to be summoned.
Location: Covenant reward: Given upon joining the Forest Hunter covenant

Rings.Name: Ring of Fog
Effects: Turns the player transparent making them un-targetable (but not un-hittable).
Note: As of Patch 1.04, users of this ring are targetable.
Location: Covenant reward: Forest Hunter, rank 0, 3 kills
Trade: Snuggly for a Skull Lantern

Rings.Name: Ring of Favor and Protection
Location: Trade: Snuggly for a Xanthous Crown

Rings.Name: Ring of the Evil Eye
Effects: Absorbs 30 HP from every fallen enemy
Note: Does not stack on multiple kills.

Rings.Name: Calamity Ring
Effects: The player receives twice the amount of damage they normally would
